traits.name: Psychic Messenger
entries: The swarm can use its {@spell sending} spell to target someone familiar to a creature in telepathic contact with the swarm.

traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6 damage) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 22 (5d8 damage) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The swarm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
footerEntries: *To cast this spell, the swarm must have more than half its hit points remaining.
